channel.title: My New Mysticism Skill - The Level Won't Refresh
channel.description:
Aye well I'm working on a new skill for OpenRune, Mysticism - but I've encountered a problem:
[b]The xp is given fine[/b] [b]I level up fine[/b] [b]The levels are saved fine[/b]
But...
On the stat screen, where it says my Mysticism Level, it doesn't update it unless I log out and in.. (F.y.i the mysticism level on my server has been placed where your quest points were normally shown)
Any ideas what I might have done wrong? Sorry about not posting all the code I've got for level-ups etc, but the source is on my other computer which does not currently have an active connection to the internet.
Thanks guys.
Edit: It would probably be better if you could PM me a solution/possible solution as I might forget to re-visit my post (as I often have done in the past)
~Cola

item.title: My New Mysticism Skill - The Level Won't Refresh
item.dc:creator: @shadow12 shadow12
item.description:
@shadow12 wrote:

maybe you could create a refresh command?

Read full topic
